name: Tiny Drop
description:
Play as a tiny rain drop down and down into a rusted pipe. Take good care of your self and collect other water drops to remain fresh. Be careful, a great amount of dirty water is also coming down the pipe behind you, and there are other trash and animals on you way through. Try to survive as long as you can!

AD for accelerate and decelerate; Space for jump

  • This is my first game jam, and my first completed unity project. I have to say it’s so much fun!! Creating music is interesting while painting sprites can be painful sometimes. Enjoy!
  • Coding: Unity C#
  • Sprites: Aseprite
  • Music: Noteflight
  • And special thanks to Elaine for helping me on my art.

Outside source used: Coder’s Crux font: https://www.dafont.com/coders-crux.font
